verses.text: \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* lifted \w up|strong="H0413"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* eyes \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* mountains, \w from|strong="H0413"\w* whence \w help|strong="H6030"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* come \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*.
\w My|strong="H3068"\w* help \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w from|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* made heaven \w and|strong="H3068"\w* earth.

\w May|strong="H3254"\w* \w he|strong="H5414"\w* \w not|strong="H3254"\w* suffer thy foot \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w be|strong="H3254"\w* moved: neither \w let|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* slumber \w that|strong="H3956"\w* keepeth thee.
Behold he \w shall|strong="H1368"\w* \w neither|strong="H5973"\w* slumber nor sleep, \w that|strong="H2671"\w* keepeth Israel.
\w The|strong="H3588"\w* Lord \w is|strong="H0168"\w* thy keeper, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Lord \w is|strong="H0168"\w* thy protection upon thy right hand.
\w The|strong="H5973"\w* sun \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w not|strong="H5315"\w* burn thee \w by|strong="H7931"\w* day: nor \w the|strong="H5973"\w* moon \w by|strong="H7931"\w* night.
\w The|strong="H3588"\w* Lord keepeth thee \w from|strong="H7965"\w* all evil: \w may|strong="H7965"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Lord keep thy soul.
May the Lord keep thy going in and thy going out; from henceforth now and for ever.
